title: How to find a wonderful idea
description: Where does OK Go come up with ideas like dancing in zero gravity, performing in ultra slow motion or constructing a warehouse-sized Rube Goldberg machine for their music videos? In between live performances of "This Too Shall Pass" and "The One Moment," lead singer and director Damian Kulash takes us inside the band's creative process, showing us how to look for wonder and surprise.
author: OK Go
keywords: TED, talks, collaboration, communication, discovery, music, live music, performance, entertainment
